title: BRIEF-Intelgenx Announces Resubmission Of Rizaport New Drug Application
text:
BRIEF-Intelgenx Announces Resubmission Of Rizaport New Drug Application

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Sep 26, 2019 16:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Intelgenx Announces Resubmission Of Rizaport New Drug Application Sept 26 (Reuters) - Intelgenx Technologies Corp : * INTELGENX ANNOUNCES RESUBMISSION OF RIZAPORT® NEW DRUG APPLICATION * INTELGENX TECHNOLOGIES - RESUBMITTED ITS 505(B)(2) NEW DRUG APPLICATION FOR RIZAPORT VERSAFILM FOR TREATMENT OF ACUTE MIGRAINES TO U.S. FDA

BRIEF-Intelgenx Announces Resubmission Of Rizaport New Drug Application
description: BRIEF-Intelgenx Announces Resubmission Of Rizaport New Drug Application
